name: publora
title: Publora
description: Manage your social media with Publora
author: anton_shvein

commands.name: schedule-post
commands.title: Schedule Post
commands.description: Create and schedule a post in Publora

preferences.name: api_key
preferences.title: Publora API Key
preferences.description: Your Publora API key. You can find it in your Publora account settings.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
